title: Yuck
text: I 100% agree with the other negative reviews on here. Instagram has gone down hill quickly since I started using it a few years ago, and now I only download the app briefly when I absolutely have to in order to message someone I don’t have another contact for. There is literally no upside, or benefit to having this app. It is designed to make you waste hours and hours and hours of your life ingesting yucky content that you can never fully filter out no matter how hard you try, and interacting in a very shallow way with your “friends” when you could be texting them, talking to them on the phone, or hanging out in person and actually building vibrant relationships. This app encourages loneliness, insecurity, and inappropriate content. Please, If you are considering downloading this app, take my warning and don’t.

title: Sweet 15 photos
text: I recently had the pleasure of booking a photo shoot with Carlos in Cartagena, Colombia, for my daughter's 15th birthday, and I must say, it exceeded all expectations. The quality of the photos was absolutely incredible, capturing every moment with stunning clarity and artistry. Carlos was not only highly skilled but also incredibly friendly, making the entire experience enjoyable and stress-free. The backdrop of Cartagena added an extra touch of magic to the photos. I highly recommend Carlos for anyone looking for a professional and friendly photographer in Cartagena.

title: Community guidelines
text: Yes I understand why the community guidelines are in place, but why is it that my comment that had absolutely nothing to do with the listed violation, was deemed as a violation. That is not bullying or harassment, and it definitely what not “using comments or posts for views, likes, etc” as your team flagged it for. It was a general statement that was not targeted at anyone. Your so called “board” must not be too fond of the right to speech. Get your stuff together.

title: Stuck in password update loop
text:
A week after installing, I couldn’t log in. The notice said my account was compromised and I should change my password, which I did, only to get the same message: “change your password.” Each password is immediately compromised. “Service” is a FAQ tree that doesn’t include my issue. Apparently I’m the only person who has this problem. I gave up, but once in awhile I get a notice or link, but I can’t get back in. It’s been years.

Still stuck year four or five. No help in faqs

title: Wow
text:
Ever since Meta took over the app has been really bad , so much more glitches / bugs, constant and constant warnings/ reports keep popping out in my Instagram from posts I’ve had up since years it is very unfair. Being claimed I copyrighted when many other people has used the same audios so why was only mine taken down?
I made a new account a couple years back because back then I had a different one that I’ve been reported by SCAMMERS and Instagram decided to delete my account acting like I did something wrong and now I can never get my account back. I do not want to risk Instagram deleting my account again by reporting content I had up for a while, phrases I say in my story is taken too harsh at times when it’s not meant for anyone but me Instagram assumes I’m attacking people and I have screenshots of what my posts say. My friends has also been having similar issues as this and this never happened so constantly before it’s really annoying- each time I write a report to repost my content again Instagram denies it all the time so I get second opinions from multiple other people and they say the total opposite and agree to my end. I’m not the first person who is going through this please fix your stuff because people are gonna continue leaving negative reviews until Instagram takes the effort to fix stuff and closely review content before completely removing it-…. It’s very unfair for a “professional” app… I’m very disappointed I deserve my old account back plus my content that been deleted!!!!! And so do my friends who has been leaving nothing but nice comments and been getting their comments removed cuz Instagram assumes it’s scam when it’s just compliments - wow… terrible terrible very disappointed Instagram was my favorite app many years ago it got so much worse over the time, if this continues to happen I may need to not support Instagram any longer and move myself to another app and I recommend people to not be afraid and report a review for Instagram to fix its stuff. Please consider to fix this problem I don’t want my account to get affected because it’s not reviewed correctly…
